UsernameRegistry","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"stateMutability":"payable","type":"receive"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Upgraded payment contract for SendCash with:      - Configurable global fee (with safety cap)      - Optional per\u2011token fee overrides      - Configurable fee recipient      - Pausable circuit breaker      - Ability to send by username or raw address      - Native ETH support alongside ERC20 tokens Notes: - Gas sponsorship / account abstraction is handled off\u2011chain (Thirdweb SDK). - This contract focuses purely on token transfers and events. - Native ETH is represented by address(0) in token parameters.","errors":{"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"SafeERC20FailedOperation(address)":[{"details":"An operation with an ERC-20 token failed."}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addSupportedToken(address)":{"details":"Add supported token. Emits TokenAdded."},"calculateEthFee(uint256)":{"details":"Calculate fee for native ETH payment."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"removeSupportedToken(address)":{"details":"Remove supported token. Emits TokenRemoved."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"sendEthPayment(string)":{"details":"Send native ETH payment to a username.","params":{"toUsername":"The recipient's username (resolved via UsernameRegistry)"}},"sendEthPaymentToAddress(address)":{"details":"Send native ETH payment directly to a raw address.      If the address has a username, it will be included in the event."},"sendPayment(string,address,uint256)":{"details":"Send payment to a username.","params":{"amount":"The amount to send (in token decimals)","toUsername":"The recipient's username (resolved via UsernameRegistry)","token":"The token address (must be supported)"}},"sendPaymentToAddress(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Send payment directly to a raw address (no username required).      If the address has a username, it will be included in the event."},"setFeeBps(uint256)":{"details":"Set global fee (in basis points). Capped by MAX_FEE_BPS."},"setFeeRecipient(address)":{"details":"Update fee recipient address."},"setNativeEthEnabled(bool)":{"details":"Enable or disable native ETH support."},"setTokenFeeBps(address,uint256)":{"details":"Set per\u2011token fee override (in basis points). 0 = use global fee. calculateEthFee(uint256).details: Calculate fee for native ETH payment.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendEthPayment(string).details: Send native ETH payment to a username.

sendEthPaymentToAddress(address).details: Send native ETH payment directly to a raw address.      If the address has a username, it will be included in the event.

params.amount: The amount to send (in token decimals)

sendPaymentToAddress(address,address,uin.details: Send payment directly to a raw address (no username required).      If the address has a username, it will be included in the event.

setFeeBps(uint256).details: Set global fee (in basis points). Capped by MAX_FEE_BPS.

setNativeEthEnabled(bool).details: Enable or disable native ETH support.

setTokenFeeBps(address,uint256).details: Set pertoken fee override (in basis points). 0 = use global fee.      Can also set fee for native ETH using address(0).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
